MCPAR.title: Managed Care Program Annual Report (MCPAR)
MCPAR.body: The MCPAR online form will be available on this website in October 2022.
MCPAR.note: Note: Every state must submit one report per program.

accordion.bodyText: Due dates vary based on contract year of the managed care program and contract period for the first report.

MLR.title: Medical Loss Ratio (MLR)
MLR.body: Complete this template and upload it at this website beginning October 2022.

accordion.bodyText: Submit your MLR template at the same time you submit your rate certification package to CMCS.

NAAAR.title: Network Adequacy and Access Assurances Report (NAAAR)
NAAAR.body: Complete this template and upload it at this website beginning October 2022.

accordion.bodyText: Submit your NAAAR when (1) your state enters contract with a new managed care plan or (2) there are any significant changes to a Managed Care Organization (MCO), Prepaid Inpatient Health Plan (PIHP) or Prepaid Ambulatory Health Plan (PAHP) operation such as:
list: Changes to services, benefits, geographic service area, composition of provider network or payments to its provider network
